Jeff Goldblum has faced backlash from viewers of RuPaul‘s Drag Race after his comments on Islam.
Appearing as a guest judge, he asked one contestant Jackie Cox, who is of Iranian ancestry, about Islam’s treatment of women and the LGBTQ+ community.

articles.content:

articles.description: West disputes the 1.3 billion valuation and says he is worth much more
articles.content:

articles.title: Mike Tyson admits Tiger King's Joe Exotic could have sold him big cats as pets - Mirror Online
articles.description: Mike Tyson confessed he could have got his tigers indirectly from Tiger King star Joe Exotic in the early 1990s
articles.content:
Mike Tyson admitted he could have got his big cats from Tiger King star Joe Exotic.
The boxing champion, 53, splashed out his cash on three Bengal tigers as house pets at his home.
